item.title: Altadena Homeowner's Month-Long Standoff With 550-Pound Black Bear Despite Weeks Of Traps: 'I Could Hear Him Moving Around'
item.description: Altadena man spent over a month with 550lb bear under home, wildlife officials fail to capture it. Bear damaged home, disabled gas line. read more
